0.2.name: wordpress/dka-child-pages-widget
0.2.description:
When navigating on pages widget shows links to child pages. If there are no child pages – widget shows „brother“ pages. Link of currently viewed page can be styled through CSS. Widget shows nothing if user is browsing Posts (not Pages). Admin can configure:

  • widget title
  • which pages must be excluded

Widget can be localized.
